text: Iwo adatsatira zimene a Satana adanena mu Ufumu wa Solomoni. Sikuti Solomoni sadakhulupirire ai koma a Satana ndiwo sadakhulupirire. Iwo amaphunzitsa anthu matsenga ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa angelo awiri Harut ndi Marut ku Babuloni. Koma iwo samaphunzitsa wina aliyense mpaka atanena kuti: “Ndithudi ife tili kukuyesani inu, ndipo musakhale wosakhulupirira ayi.” Kuchokera kwa angelo chimene chimamasula pakati pa mwamuna ndi mkazi wake, ndipo iwo sadaononge wina aliyense ndi zimene adaphunzira kupatula ndi chilolezo cha Mulungu. Iwo amaphunzira zinthu zimene zimawaononga ndipo sizidawapindulire china chilichonse. Ndithudi iwo amadziwa kuti aliyense amene amachita matsenga sadzakhala ndi gawo m’moyo umene uli nkudza. Zopanda pake ndi zimene agulitsa nazo moyo wawo, iwo akadadziwa
